name: @vukovicpavle/lemon-form-factory
description: üçã Form Factory is a library that helps you create forms in React with Formik.

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:esm:watch & npm run build:cjs:watch
scripts.replace: cd example && npm uninstall @vukovicpavle/lemon-form-factory && npm install ../ && cd ..
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run build:watch" "nodemon -w lib -e js,ts,tsx --exec 'npm run replace'"
